name: Stealthy Suspect
description:
***Lighting Doesn't work in WebGL***

We could not use WebGL, sorry for the inconvenience.

Game for Ludum Dare 47. It was made for the jam, by Skiwee and CodeHacher123. All feedback is greatly appreciated.

In the game you have to escape the rooms, you can dash and hug the walls to avoid the guards. However, every time you exit a room you seem to loop back in some way.

WASD or Arrows to move, space to dash, and you auto wall hug when close enough to a wall.

Our YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJdOe_Puq6XTBGNE5MWmJxw
